H0.text: What is the term for the reddish-brown hydrated oxide formed on iron. Hematite

H1.text: What is the term for the reddish-brown hydrated oxide formed on iron. Iron Oxide Hydroxide

H2.text: What is the term for the reddish-brown hydrated oxide formed on iron. Ferric Hydroxide

H3.text: What is the term for the reddish-brown hydrated oxide formed on iron. FEO3

A4.text: On heating, β-FeOOH decomposes and recrystallizes as α-Fe2O3 (hematite).

A5.text: Iron(III) oxyhydroxide is also called iron oxide-hydroxide.
